<template>
<MainPage v-if="currentPage === 'main'"></MainPage>
<ProductPage v-else-if="currentPage === 'product'"></ProductPage>
</template>

<script>
im
import ProductPage from "@/pages/ProductPage.vue";

export default {
  data() { 
    return {
      currentPage: 'main'
    }
  },
  components: {MainPage, ProductPage}
}
  
</script>
